column2: The Sports Bag (February 2015) - National Council of Teachers of Mathematics
column3: Your company makes sports bags. Your job is to make pattern pieces and design their placement on fabric to avoid waste. Another group sews the bags and adds the handles. Each bag is in the shape of a cylinder (see below) and meets these criteria:

column2: The Sports Bag (February 2015) - National Council of Teachers of Mathematics
column3: CCSSM: SMP 1, 2, 3, and 6; Content Standards 6.G.4 and 7.G.4
